Text: Notice of Resettlement Cc ERCOT has published resettlement statements for operating days of and These resettlement statements are issued as a result of aggregated settlement disputes on final statements for these operating days that have been granted by ERCOT There will be no additional settlement runs for these days until the Trueup statements If you have any questions please contact your ERCOT client representative Ted Hailu Client Relations Manager Electric Reliability Council of Texas Email Telephone

Replacement Invoice Cc ERCOT has published a replacement invoice to add final settlement statements to the previously issued invoice with a due date of This invoice was previously published with initial settlement statements for trade days of through The replacement invoice adds final settlement statements for trade days through to this invoice The replacement invoice was posted to the portal on Please update your records to replace the previously issued invoice and process any payments due ERCOT as per the replacement invoice ERCOT will process the any payments due to QSEs as per the replacement invoices Ted Hailu Client Relations Manager Electric Reliability Council of Texas Email Telephone
